column5: There's no place to stop on 502, so relieve yourself in Fort Francis.
I like the 502....very scenic but makes sure you are fueled up....no place to gas up.

It is a beautiful drive. We've seen all sorts of wildlife, saw wolves 2x, moose, even helped a 30lb snapping turtle off the road :-) Much like all the other roads up there, use extra caution for animals, especially at night.

We've been heading north of Vermilion Bay for almost 15 years, We've 502 and 71 each about 50% of the time. We think the 20 minutes you save on 502 aren't worth it. No Shoulders. The brush isn't clear cut back hardly at all; if at all. 71 has shoulders and is cleared back a good 50 feet from the shoulder. Better visibility for those furry criteers popping out. Plus with it being cleared more and it snaking through LOTW; I think you see much more water and scenery. AND you can get gas or pee if needed.
Your right,if you want to look at trees on both sides of the road then 502 is the one,I take the 502 but I find it very boring after doing it a few hundred times.

We took the 502 for about 25 years or so, then started taking the 71. The 71 is a nicer route because you can stop at several places for a bathroom or just to stretch your legs. It's worth the extra 20 min.
I have bought that's what all the pulp check pullovers were for ..
For those of you up there already, any reports on the condition of 502? Will be heading up to Sioux Lookout in a few weeks and curious what route to take.
502 should be in great shape just keep it under 100 mph.
You'll get run over on that highway if you go under - say 90 mph!
Seriously? I always drive the actual speed limit or maybe just a hair above because I love the wilderness, and I rarely get passed by anyone.
Be aware that in many places the shoulder is non existent, not my favorite road to travel, I prefer to go around, altho can maybe save 20 miles by taking 502. Bill

never been up that way. this yr will be my first time. So just trying to glean info so I can make an intelligent decision when July rolls around. On map it shows as a lighter shade than what 71 does, so i'm surmising that its quality was not as good.
502 is a good road go for it.watch out for road warriors on the 502.
